This is a GFWL game. So maybe you have to create a local profile to enable saves, like it was in DiRT 2.
To make a local profile, press home and go to make a new profile optin. It will take you to a page. Do not create it just then. Scroll down in this page and there would be a hyperlink to create a local profile..
Hope this helps.

Let me reframe that, the purpose of a crack and keygen is for it to work properly, nm the online comment.

For those that cannot install this torrent just turn the internet off, install the torrent that has been posted in the comments section, using the recommended serial and finish the installation. Once this is completed, copy the "1911.dll" and "f1-2010.exe" that are included in this crack into the F1 2010 installation directory in x86 Program Files. Make a backup of "f1-2010.exe" first. Once this is done, launch the game. Don't sign into an online account, create an offline one like so below. Hope this helps! Any Q's, send them to "razyre@razyre.co.cc"
